titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Saint Lucia
Saint Lucia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no systematic declassification of documents.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of External Affairs: Conway Business Centre, Waterfront, Castries, Saint Lucia.
St Lucia National Archives: PO Box 3060, Clarke St, Vigie, Castries, St Lucia.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write to both the Ministry of External Affairs and the National Archives to inquire about their holdings. Note that older documents may still reside in the UK National Archives.
